title: Fintech lenders have high delinquency levels in small value loans says RBI
description: The RBI has highlighted concerns over consumer loans, noting that over half of borrowers have three or more loans simultaneously. The Financial Stability Report flags high delinquency rates, especially among personal loans under â‚¹50,000 and loans from fintech lenders. Despite overall improvements in credit quality, stress in retail loans remains significant, particularly for private sector banks.
